_comment: Template for creating new source data files
_instructions: Copy this file, rename it, and fill in your source data

_required_fields.excerpt: Full description with roleplay cues embedded naturally. Should be vivid and engaging, not generic.

_optional_fields.conflict_hook: Specific, actionable conflict for story integration

_quality_guidelines.minimum_50: Clear excerpt, 3+ tags, basic archetype, one conflict hook
_quality_guidelines.high_80: Rich excerpt with embedded cues, 5+ tags, clear archetype, active conflict, 2-3 rp cues, world context, complete mechanics, vivid prose
_quality_guidelines.exemplary_90: All high-quality criteria + unique concept, rich sensory details, multiple hooks, world integration, DM-ready

_example.excerpt: Tiefling Dream Archivist who curates forbidden wing, recording dreams as primary sources. Speaks in hushed present-tense. Eyes glaze when playing back nightmares. Offers secrets in exchange for players' dreams.
_example.conflict_hook: Demonic patron demands redaction of history to glorify infernal dynasty. Needs protection during public reading.
rp_cues: eyes glaze when playing back nightmares
